text: Martín Dopazo (born 13 March 1969) is an Argentine equestrian. He competed at the 2000 Summer Olympics and the 2004 Summer Olympics. He won the Platinum Konex Award in 2010 as the best equestrian of the last decade in Argentina. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Argentina Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2007 Pan American Games Category:Equestrians at the 2011 Pan American Games Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Martín Dopazo
